author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in aumento a 695,801 mld euro, prestiti 299 mln Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 2 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 299 266 Use of overnight deposit facility 695,801 684,149 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click . To see graph, right-click and select 'graph' option. (Reporting by Frankfurt newsroom)
